import React, { Fragment, useState } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; export default function Sizebar() { const [isSettingsCollapseOpen, setIsSettingsCollapseOpen] = useState(false); const [isMedicalServicesCollapseOpen, setIsMedicalServicesCollapseOpen] = useState(false); const [isPersonnelManagementCollapseOpen, setIsPersonnelManagementCollapseOpen] = useState(false); const [isPatientRecordsCollapseOpen, setIsPatientRecordsCollapseOpen] = useState(false); const [isInventoryCollapseOpen, setIsInventoryCollapseOpen] = useState(false); const toggleSettingsCollapse = () => setIsSettingsCollapseOpen(!isSettingsCollapseOpen); const toggleMedicalServicesCollapse = () => setIsMedicalServicesCollapseOpen(!isMedicalServicesCollapseOpen); const togglePersonnelManagementCollapse = () => setIsPersonnelManagementCollapseOpen(!isPersonnelManagementCollapseOpen); const togglePatientRecordsCollapse = () => setIsPatientRecordsCollapseOpen(!isPatientRecordsCollapseOpen); const toggleInventoryCollapse = () => setIsInventoryCollapseOpen(!isInventoryCollapseOpen); return (
